import { PlayArrow, Add, ThumbDownAltOutlined, ThumbUpAltOutlined } from '@material-ui/icons' import React, { useState } from 'react' import './listItem.scss' const ListItem = ({index}) => { const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false); const trailer ='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5qap5aO4i9A&ab_channel=LofiGirl' return (
setIsHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsHovered(false)} style={{left: isHovered && index*255-50 + index*2.5}}> {isHovered && ( <>
) } export default ListItem
